home.title: Sorting & Filtering
home.tip: Using the panel at the top you can order desires by date, price, or most wanted. In addition you can only view desires that only contain a certain tag and ofcourse sort them in ascending or descending direction

home.title: Searching
home.tip: Use the search bar on the left to look for desires by their title. After that you can use the panels at the top to adjust your search results further

postingDesire.title: Posting a Desire
postingDesire.tip: Enter the details of the item you want, a title, a description, a price you would like to get it for, a picture if you have something in mind and finally tags to classify what kind of desire it is.

postingDesire.title: Selecting Tags
postingDesire.tip: Selecting a tag is very important to classify what kind of desire you posted, it also helos us notify user who can provide with an item

makingOffer.title: Making an Offer
makingOffer.tip: If have the item you can provide, enter a description of the item, enter the price you are willing to offer it to, and include a picture if you want to

profile.title: Editing Information
profile.tip: Change any information you want about you, you can enter a description and a photo that will be seen by buyers when they accept your offer

profile.title: Setting Alerts
profile.tip: You can be informed through text when a desire gets posted that has a tag you want to be alerted about. Select at max 3 here and be the first to here about posted desires

profile.title: Viewing Past Posts
profile.tip: Below the alerts you can see all the desires you posted and the offers you made in the past

singleDesire.title: Desire Information
singleDesire.tip: This page tells you information about the desire, including how many times it got viewed, and how many people want this desire and are waiting for offers to come in.

singleDesire.title: Actions on Desires & Offers
singleDesire.tip: On this desire you can be alerted to offers that are made to this desire, or make an offer your self for the desire posted
